ComicInfo.Title: Chapter Three: Waterwhirled
ComicInfo.Summary:
It came from Hollywood! Elvira has discovered her co-star’s monstrous secret, and she’s not the only one. Things get out of hand on the set of “The Heart is a Black Lagoon,” as murder, mystery and interspecies romance all come to a boil in the penultimate issue of THE SHAPE OF ELVIRA!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Francesco Francavilla | 1 | B | Cover B | J. Bone | 6 | G/RI | 1:30 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Dave Acosta | 7 | H/RI | 1:40 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Photo" Edition Variant Cover | Photo | 8 |
